gihi pawidi bhedaya pawathinuye da mathupita andume pahaya ha hadaya anuwa nowe.buddha kalaye chiwaraya sakas karana ladde malamini ethu panshakula chiwara ha iwathalu redikada kabali kara kapa pandu powaganimeni.nuthana yugaye eya widesratawala nimawana lada ihala watinakam athi istharamma piliwarga bhawithakara sakas karannak dakwa eya bahirawa sanwardhanayawi thibe.eeta sapekshakawa panshukula chiwara,pindapatha,rukkhamula senasana, puthi muththa bhesajja wani siwnissayada mulika gihi pawidi bhedaya wath salakiya nohaki tharam sukhopabhogi thathwayen uparima mattamakata bahira opayen sanwardhanayawi thibe.eeta sapekshakawa mulika samanera winaya shikshawala sita upasampada shilaye chula,madhyama ha maha shila mattamwala pawathiya yuthu awama bahira lakshana pawa gihi pawidi bhedaya athulatha gunawathkama anuwa wenkara salakagatha nohaki mattamakata paminemin thibe.
